instruction: Summarize this article about energy efficiency.
input: Energy efficiency is the process of reducing the amount of energy used for providing the same service. Common ways to increase energy efficiency include installing insulation and energy-efficient light bulbs, using more efficient appliances, and installing solar panels. It is important for both individuals and businesses to maximize energy efficiency as it saves money, reduces energy consumption and emissions, and can lead to improvements in comfort and health in the home or office.
output: Energy efficiency is an important way to save money, reduce energy consumption and emissions, and improve comfort and health. It involves installing insulation, energy-efficient light bulbs, more efficient appliances, and solar panels to reduce the amount of energy used for the same service. This can lead to significant financial savings, as well as lower emissions and a better quality of life.
